epfl.sweng.backend

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.sweng.backend.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a question that a user gets asked in the quiz application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Alternative constructor for sending a question (we don't have questionId nor owner)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(long questionId,
        java.lang.String questionStmt,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> questionAnswers,
        int questionSolutionIndex,
        java.util.List<java.lang.String> questionTags,
        java.lang.String questionOwner)
        Parameters:
        id - : long that uniquely identifies a question.
        question - : String that contains the text of the question.
        answers - : List of String objects that contains the possible answers. The list is 0-indexed, meaning that the first element's index is 0. The order of the answers is important, because the correct answer is identified by its index in the answers list.
        solutionIndex - : Int that indicates the correct answer by its position in the answers list.
        tags - : Set of question tags.
        owner - : Question owner.
